SEARCH
Package wtf.file.api.editable.metadata

Schnittstelle EditableMetadataContainer

Alle Superschnittstellen:
MetadataContainer
public interface EditableMetadataContainer extends MetadataContainer
Represents a container for editable metadata.

This interface extends the MetadataContainer and provides additional methods for modifying the metadata, including setting and removing metadata entries.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    remove(String key)
    Removes the metadata entry associated with the specified key from the container.
    void
    set(String key, String value)
    Sets the value of a metadata entry associated with the specified key.

    Von Schnittstelle geerbte Methoden wtf.file.api.metadata.MetadataContainer

    asMap, get, has, keys

  • Methodendetails

    • remove

      void remove(String key)
      Removes the metadata entry associated with the specified key from the container. If the key is not in the container, this method does nothing.
      Parameter:
      key - the key of the metadata entry to be removed

    • set

      void set(String key, String value) throws IllegalCharacterException
      Sets the value of a metadata entry associated with the specified key. If a metadata entry with the specified key already exists, its value is updated. If the specified key or value contains illegal characters, an exception is thrown.
      Parameter:
      key - the key of the metadata entry to be set, only ASCII characters, excluding the NUL characters, are allowed.
      value - the value to be associated with the specified key, any UTF-8 encodable characters, excluding the NUL characters, are allowed.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalCharacterException - if the key or value contains one or more illegal characters
